body.p: The Current Population Survey conducted by the Census Bureau records the incomes of a large sample of U.S. households each month. What will be the relationship between the mean and median of the collected data?

multiple_choice.choice: The mean will be bigger than the median.
The mean will be smaller than the median.
The mean and the median will be about the same.

response.feedback: Correct. The distribution of incomes is skewed right, so the mean will be bigger than the median.
Incorrect. The mean is smaller than the median when the distribution is skewed left. Recall that the distribution of incomes is skewed right.
Incorrect. The mean and the median will be about the same when the distribution is symmetric. Recall that the distribution of incomes is skewed right.

part.hint: Recall that datasets of incomes typically have a distribution that is skewed right.
